page.title: 08Interesting Edinburgh People
page.content: As Deaconess of Drylaw Parish Church,{ {Miss Crawford}works with people of all ages, taking Sunday School and running clubs for children after school and in the holidays. She helps old people too. {Dr.Graham-Yooll}is a specialist in child development. She decides how some children can be helped to develop well, and sends them to doctors or therapists for treatment. She visits homes, nurseries and schools to improve life for the many children who visit her clinics each year. {Mrs.Shoniwa}is a residential social worker in Silverlea, a home for the elderly. The oldest resident is 101 years old, the youngest about 60. She takes care of all their needs, and says a favourite interest is in handcrafts.
